title: Cat in the Pupa - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Charismatic Protagonist   Death   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Love Triangles   Nobles   Royalty   Time Travel
author: Bae Hee Jin   Juitong Saetong   쥐똥새똥
description:
Kit never forgot her first love, Edwin. One day, she realized that Edwin had been sending some kind of signal for help. So she turned back time to the day when he was still alive. Edwin had given up on his life and only waited for his death to come. But when Kit pleaded for his life, his frozen heart thawed a little.

“Let’s move forward, but this time we will escape death,” she said, “You are not alone. We will do this together.”

Their affections for each other grew more as they battled against death. However, there was a dark energy of an inevitable doom that hovered between them….

“Your presence. You being alive is all that matters to me,” she said.

The moment they meet each other over time, their love becomes a stronger reality.>
